quest.name: The Greater Obeisance
journal: Alphinaud is eager to join Cid and the others.
Alphinaud informs you that the Omega contingent is assembling at the airship landing. Make haste and join Cid and the others.

Cid seems bent on heading directly for Carteneau, but Alphinaud requests a short delay to confirm the situation in the East Shroud before departing. Having acquiesced to Alphinaud's wish, Cid offers to fly the remaining members of the contingent to Mor Dhona. Speak with Hida at the landing gate when you are ready to board the Enterprise Excelsior.
After a brief flight, you arrive a short distance from the walls of Revenant's Toll. Speak with Cid before making your way into town.

Cid apologizes for not being able to land within the settlement proper, and suggests that you all retire to the Rising Stones. Perhaps this would be a suitable place to approach Nero, and learn more of your unexpected ally...

Alphinaud returns from the East Shroud accompanied by Yda, but the melancholy mood which descends at her mention of Papalymo is swiftly shattered by the booming entrance of Gosetsu. The samurai has arrived with dire news from Doma, but far from persuading Yugiri to return to her homeland, he is instead convinced by Nero's mention of the Empire to join the mission to Carteneau. Speak with Yda when you are ready to set forth.
objectives: Speak with Cid at the airship landing in Gridania.
Speak with Hida at the airship landing in Gridania.
Speak with Cid in Mor Dhona.
Speak with Nero at the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Cid and the others are assembling at the airship landing.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie is already on her way, and it would not do to lag too far behind. Let us be off.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text:
Let's see here...
Riol's report needs to be filed, Alianne has requested additional supplies, and then there's─ Oh! Don't mind me! Everything's under control!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Where is everyone...?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Forename, Alphinaud! Ready to go? The others have stepped out onto the landing for a moment, lest you wonder. Nero insisted that he be allowed to inspect the Excelsior before boarding.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And you let him? Despite his very timely offer of assistance, the thought of that man poking about in the workings of the ship without proper supervision does not fill me with confidence.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Calm yourself, Alphinaud─your sister was adamant that he would never leave her sight. She and Yugiri are─ Ah, well here they are now.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Right, I think that's everyone. Shall I set course for Carteneau?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ah, might I ask that we delay our departure slightly? I require no more than a few hours at most. Our colleagues are studying the cocoon even as we speak, and I would hear their latest observations ere we proceed.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It would seem wise to gain as clear an understanding of the situation as possible before formulating our plan.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Oh? I thought time was against us! How foolish of me.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hold your tongue. When we want your opinion, we'll ask for it.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Forgive me, my lady! I shall keep my counsel until such time as you have finished procrastinating.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: All right. While Alphinaud speaks with his colleagues, I shall fly the Excelsior over to Mor Dhona, and we can reconvene at the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Mine apologies for the trouble. I shall visit Y'shtola and the others forthwith, and join you as soon as I am able.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename, pray accompany Alisaie back to the Rising Stones. I should feel safer knowing you are present to entertain our “guest.”

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Right. Everyone heading to Mor Dhona is welcome to travel aboard the Excelsior. I'll clear things with the girl at the counter here. Let her know when you're ready to leave.

dialogue.name: HIDA
dialogue.text: You are traveling with Master Garlond, misssir? The Enterprise Excelsior is right this way.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Travel to Mor Dhona?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Not quite a door-to-door service, but I couldn't exactly land her in the Toll's main square...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Shall we adjourn to the Rising Stones, then?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Strange though it may seem, Nero's former loyalties do not trouble me. But I can see why people are loath to lower their guard around him.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I do not care for that man...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: What manner of airship has no private cabins!? Then again, I suppose Garlond had to find somewhere to stow his half-baked inventions...

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Forename, wait! Could I speak to you for a moment?

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Do you remember when I had you meet me at the Diamond Forge, and we, uh...ambushed you?

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Well, once we had your measurements, I set to work making you a traveling outfit in my spare time. I've only just this moment finished the stitching, but I wanted you to have it before you left. Here!

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: You can try it on right now, if you like!

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text:
Assuming we measured correctly, the fit should be just right. Snug but not too snug, if you know what I mean...?
Sooo...how does it feel?

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: You're not just saying that, are you!? Oh, I can't tell you how much this means to me! To have crafted something worthy of the Warrior of Light is... It's─ Well, let's just say it makes all the practice worthwhile.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: I also sewed in a blood pearl charm to...you know...bring you home. May it always protect you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: One was created to capture Bahamut and the other to surpass him... Which will prove the stronger, I wonder.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
We must be careful, old friend. The walking weapons of Allag were expressly designed to subdue primals, but men like Gaius will always seek to use them against mankind. It falls to us to ensure that Omega is never employed as a weapon of war. In the wrong hands, it would be...
It would be bad.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Fear not. I shall keep a close eye on our new ally.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: I know Nero's a guest here, but we don't exactly have the happiest history with the Empire, do we? So my question to you is: do I offer him tea?
